price: 26. Мре akendaki malembe epai ya libota naye mpe amemelaki bango ngombe ya mafrita ya kotumba.
arabic: فَرَاغَ إِلَىٰٓ أَهۡلِهِۦ فَجَآءَ بِعِجۡلٖ سَمِينٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: farāgha ilā ahlihi fajāa biʿij'lin samīnin
